topics.body:
"@Randomosaur":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d88220636872572e650100#post_53d88220636872572e650100
You will never see a real dinosaur and any "dinosaur" you will ever see will be engineered birds to have similar traits as dinosaurs and thus not actually dinosaurs nor will you evil be able to giggity with a *real* dinosaur.



You know I thought of something; is it just me or do we as a species have a massive habit of trying to think whenever we're being irrational that we try write it off as being rational?  What I mean by this is just look at FOXNews and how they constantly try to rationalize that their paranoia is rational?
